verbose_text: Local injections of the GABA A receptor antagonist bicuculline into the deep layers of the SC (see XREF_FIG for a typical recording / injection site in the colliculus and XREF_FIG for reconstructed plots of all sites) produced widespread disinhibition within the colliculus, as evidenced by an increase in baseline firing rate (XREF_TABLE and XREF_TABLE) and extensive expression of c-fos product, a marker for neuronal activation.
